ygData.subject: Re: This is great!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Tsk. I saw the group you were with last night. If you died fighting those Orc Cents I am going to set a mocking hot key and hit it about 100 times next
ygData.messageBody:
Virginia Renaut wrote:
>
> From: Virginia Renaut <vrenaut@...>
>
> I'm happy to see my friends and acquaintances joining this group! I'd name
> names but I'd undoubtedly miss someone and I'd hate to offend. This poor monk
> is still a bit addled after some rather heinous deaths recently. Its
> especially nice to have a storyteller in our midst, as it gives me something
> to do while I heal... and heal... and heal.

Tsk. I saw the group you were with last night. If you died fighting
those Orc Cents I am going to set a mocking hot key and hit it about 100
times next time I see you online.

> Xeones - you greedy fiend. One of these days you'll abandon your lust for
> expensive bits of metal and learn the true art of combat. That said, remind
> me to examine our heads next time we romp around the Dervish camp. Owie.

Expensive bits of metal are unfortunately quite heavy. Let us eschew
these material goods!

Dirque. Monk of 500 coppers.
